events.message: We have successfully received your application for the software engineer position and our team will review it shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department based on your experience and skills.
A recruiter has been assigned to you and will be your point of contact for the upcoming stages of the hiring process.
You have passed the initial screening successfully. Our team was impressed with your technical background.
Thank you for promptly confirming your availability for the next interview step. We appreciate your enthusiasm.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 10th. Please check your email for the meeting link and instructions.
The technical interview was completed successfully. Our interviewers noted your strong problem-solving skills and expertise.
Your HR interview has been scheduled for May 15th to discuss work culture, benefits, and to address any questions you have.
The HR interview went very well. We found you to be a great fit for both the role and the company culture.
We are excited to extend a formal offer for the Software Engineer position. Please review the details and let us know your decision.
We have received your positive feedback on the offer and are happy to answer any further questions you may have.
Congratulations on accepting our offer! We look forward to having you join the team as our new Software Engineer.
Your onboarding process has started. Please complete all required forms and attend the welcome orientations scheduled this week.
The hiring process is now complete. We are thrilled to officially welcome you to our engineering team. Best of luck!
